## ActionsFromExtensions type

Utility type which receives an extension and provides the type of actions it makes available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ActionsFromExtensions<GExtension extends AnyExtension> = UnionToIntersection<MapCommandToAction<GExtension['_C']>>;
```
